title: Ai ni Somare
description: Ai, a unique kimono dye artist, was rejected by fashion designer Tokiwa. After 6 years, they meet once again – except this time, Tokiwa is in need of Ai's special skills… In hopes of purging this unrequited love out of his system, Ai demands for Tokiwa to become his lover in exchange for the kimono dye Tokiwa very much covets! Will the pure and innocent dye artist be able to produce the kimono dye for his contracted lover!?
